
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VTerc4Encoder4to10.cpp
          VTerc4Encoder4to10.h
          VTerc4Encoder4to10__Syms.cpp
          VTerc4Encoder4to10__Syms.h
  DEPENDS Terc4Encoder4to10.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Terc4Encoder4to10.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VTerc4Encoder4to10 STATIC VTerc4Encoder4to10.cpp VTerc4Encoder4to10__Syms.cpp
    Terc4Encoder4to10.v
)

target_compile_options(VTerc4Encoder4to10 PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VTerc4Encoder4to10 PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VTerc4Encoder4to10 verilated)
